sentences.en: "Go easy on him," Sam repeated, opening the door.
sentences.cn: “对他宽容点，”萨姆开门的时候重复道。

sentences.en: After repeated education they still refused to correct their errors.
sentences.cn: 经过反复教育,他们仍拒不改正错误.

sentences.en: Captain Cornish repeated his order to heave to.
sentences.cn: 科尼什船长再次下达了停航的命令。

sentences.en: During that time there have been repeated attempts to reintroduce capital punishment.
sentences.cn: 在那段时期不断有人试图恢复死刑。

sentences.en: He looked back at the abject, silent girl and repeated his question.
sentences.cn: 他转过头看着这个噤若寒蝉的女孩，又重复了一遍他的问题。

sentences.en: I repeated my question for good measure.
sentences.cn: 另外，我重复了我的问题。

sentences.en: Jones was ordered off in the second half after repeated fouls.
sentences.cn: 由于屡次犯规,琼斯在下半场中被责令退出比赛.

sentences.en: She repeated her protestation of innocence.
sentences.cn: 她再度强调自己是清白的。

sentences.en: Skill is acquired through repeated practice, and practice makes perfect.
sentences.cn: 久练为熟, 熟能生巧.

sentences.en: The children repeated the words after her in chorus.
sentences.cn: 孩子们跟她齐声朗读单词.

sentences.en: The Foreign Secretary's views on the treaty are well-documented and oft-repeated.
sentences.cn: 外交大臣就该条约发表的观点有大量记述并被屡屡提及。

sentences.en: the prisoner's repeated denials of the charges against him
sentences.cn: 囚犯再三否认对他的指控

sentences.en: With repeated applications of weedkiller, the weeds were overcome.
sentences.cn: 经过反复施用除草剂，杂草得以彻底根除。

words.tran_cn: [通信] 中继器；[通信] 转发器；重复者

trans.tran_cn: 反复的，再三的，重复的，累，频仍
trans.tran_en: done or happening again and again
